DANCE IN C. E. HALL
TOMORROW NIGHT •
There will be a regular
Saturday Night dance given
in 'the C. E. Hall from nine
P. M. to twelve M. tomorrow under the auspices of
the Cotillon. Club. The admission will be one dollar,
stag or couple.
.
The Cotillon' Club will
give a dance after the Mary-'
land game at the Pythianr
Hall, Charles and Preston
Streets, from 10 to 1.
The admission price of this
dance will be two dollars
stag and a dollar and a half
for a couple.
